com.bluegosling.concurrent.locks

Interface Locking.ReadWriteLocking

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Locking.StampedLocking
    Enclosing interface:
    Locking

    public static interface Locking.ReadWriteLocking
    An interface that encapsulates typical patterns for read-write locks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T callWithReadLock(Callable<T> action)
      Invokes the given action while holding a read (e.g.
      <T> T callWithWriteLock(Callable<T> action)
      Invokes the given action while holding a write (e.g.
      void demoteToRead()
      Demotes the currently held write lock to a read lock.
      default Locking forReadLock()
      Returns a locking interface that corresponds to the read (e.g.
      default Locking forWriteLock()
      Returns a locking interface that corresponds to the write (e.g.
      void runWithReadLock(Runnable action)
      Runs the given action while holding a read (e.g.
      void runWithWriteLock(Runnable action)
      Runs the given action while holding a write (e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • runWithReadLock

        void runWithReadLock(Runnable action)
        Runs the given action while holding a read (e.g. shared) lock.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to run

      • callWithReadLock

        <T> T callWithReadLock(Callable<T> action)
                throws Exception
        Invokes the given action while holding a read (e.g. shared) lock.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to run
        Returns:
        the value returned by the given action
        Throws:
        Exception - if the given action throws an action

      • runWithWriteLock

        void runWithWriteLock(Runnable action)
        Runs the given action while holding a write (e.g. exclusive) lock.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to run
        Throws:
        IllegalMonitorStateException - if the thread already holds a read lock (since a read lock cannot be upgraded to a write lock this way)

      • callWithWriteLock

        <T> T callWithWriteLock(Callable<T> action)
                 throws Exception
        Invokes the given action while holding a write (e.g. exclusive) lock.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to run
        Returns:
        the value returned by the given action
        Throws:
        Exception - if the given action throws an action
        IllegalMonitorStateException - if the thread already holds a read lock (since a read lock cannot be upgraded to a write lock this way)

      • demoteToRead

        void demoteToRead()
        Demotes the currently held write lock to a read lock.
        Throws:
        IllegalMonitorStateException - if the current thread does not hold a write lock

      • forReadLock

        default Locking forReadLock()
        Returns a locking interface that corresponds to the read (e.g. shared) lock.
        Returns:
        a locking interface that corresponds to the read lock

      • forWriteLock

        default Locking forWriteLock()
        Returns a locking interface that corresponds to the write (e.g. exclusive) lock.
        Returns:
        a locking interface that corresponds to the write lock
